alert.note: Alert for Bingham; Blaine; Butte; Jefferson (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 02 at 5:02PM MDT until July 02 at 5:15PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 515 PM MDT FOR EAST CENTRAL BLAINE...SOUTHWESTERN JEFFERSON...SOUTHEASTERN BUTTE AND NORTHWESTERN BINGHAM COUNTIES... At 501 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 9 miles south of Northwest Inl to 6 miles west of Southeast Inl to 11 miles southwest of Southwest Inl, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Central Inl, Southeast Inl, Southwest Inl and Big Southern Butte. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Wind damage with these storms may occur without rain or lightning. Do not wait for the sound of thunder before taking cover. SEEK SHELTER IMMEDIATELY inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
